I've always celebrated to, of course, get lots of presents. Ha! Merry Chris=
tmas. By the way, Metroid Fusion is the best game in the history of games..=
.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: EmprzAnastazia@... 
  To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, December 25, 2002 3:56 PM
  Subjec=
t: Re: Merry Christmas!


  In a message dated 12/25/02 1:36:13 PM Central =
Standard Time, wingedwarrior41@... writes:



    Merry Christmas e=
verybody and may your wishes come true! Unless they
    include someone's d=
eath, especially mine... :O



  Merry Christmas to you as well, hun. 
  In=
 such a time when we miss a loved one in a joyous day, remember their laugh=
 & smile & that they are still with you. 
  May you all have a wonderful Ch=
ristmas. To celebrate the reason for the season of Him who came to give us =
all life & love. 

  Stac 
  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Ya=
hoo! Terms of Service.
